assessments.status_rationale: Today’s items reference a major winter storm (photos/forecast) but do not report any PJM/MISO/SPP/ERCOT NERC Energy Emergency Alert (EEA) level 2 or 3 declaration or winter-storm-related fuel/generation constraints triggering an EEA.

No market data in today’s bullets indicates USD/JPY had an intraday range of 3.0 yen or more.

No reporting in today’s bullets indicates the Senate Banking Committee held a markup/vote to report out a standalone stablecoin federal framework bill.

No BIS export-controls rulemaking update is referenced in today’s bullets, and nothing indicates new/revised restrictions explicitly naming Nvidia or creating new thresholds covering Nvidia’s China-market accelerators.

No quarterly filing data in today’s bullets indicates any $5B+ market-cap publicly traded BDC reported non-accruals at or above 3.0% of portfolio at fair value.
